Name: Tokyo Tea
Ingredients: Top up with Cola (e.g. Coca-Cola or Pepsi)
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with cola, lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: Light, floral and, due to the tannins in the jasmine tea, refreshingly dry.
History: Created by yours truly (Simon Difford) in 2004.
Nutrition: One serving of Tokyo Tea contains 178 calories
